headline: Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK) on Value Investing Subreddit Page by CompanyCharts. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MRK. Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK)’s share was trading at $77.23 as of May 19th. MRK’s trailing and forward P/E were 11.23 and 8.64 respectively according to Yahoo […]

headline: Pfizer Looks Like A Great Play At Current Valuations
summary: Pfizer is an attractive value play, trading at a significant discount despite strong profitability and growth fundamentals versus peers.
